title: Syros Beaches
description: The final project of my scholarship at Udacity: An interactive list of beaches in Syros Island. Click on a beach marker or a name on the list, and view the pictures (if available).

title: My Library
description: An app that helps you keep track of your books. You can find new books, and add them to a shelf.

title: Memory Game
description: A classic memory game, featuring Ancient Greece.

title: Restaurant Previews
description: This project was about adding responsiveness, accessibility and caching to a given app with reviews of New York city's restaurants.
